description: The latest OSAPI v1.1 specification changes the behavior of /servers/<id>/meta. The corresponding api controllers need to be updated.
title: OSAPI v1.1 servers metadata does not match the spec

comments.content: The latest OSAPI v1.1 specification changes the behavior of /servers/<id>/meta. The corresponding api controllers need to be updated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
